Package orego.patterns

Classes dealing with pattern recognition, as described in Gelly et al, "Modification of UCT with Patterns in Monte-Carlo Go".

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorSpecificPattern
    A pattern that only applies when a specific color is to play.
    Cut1Pattern
    Gelly et al's Cut1 pattern.
    Pattern
    A pattern for matching 3x3 neighborhoods on the board.
    RatedPattern  
    SimplePattern
    The most common type of pattern, matching for either color.

Package orego.patterns Description

Classes dealing with pattern recognition, as described in Gelly et al, "Modification of UCT with Patterns in Monte-Carlo Go". There is also code in Board keeping track of current neighborhoods and in orego.policy.PatternPolicy using this information to suggest moves.
